SEARCH
Package main.data.impl.graph.WeightedGraph

Class MatrixGraph<T>

java.lang.Object
main.data.impl.graph.WeightedGraph.MatrixGraph<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements stored in the graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<T>
public class MatrixGraph<T> extends Object implements GraphADT<T>
Graph represents an adjacency matrix implementation of a graph.
